# Plugin Config Modal CSS Cleanup Analysis

## Overview
Analysis of CSS classes and styles in `/Users/dbright/mcp/gatekit/gatekit/tui/screens/plugin_config/modal.py` after the TUI modal layout refactoring.

## Currently USED CSS Classes

### Modal Structure
- `.dialog` - Main modal container wrapper
- `.title` - Modal title at top
- `.form-content` - VerticalScroll container for form fields
- `.button-row` - Bottom button container

### Field Styling (from json_form_adapter.py)
- `.field-label` - Field labels
- `.field-description` - Field descriptions
- `.field-error` - Validation error messages
- `.section-title` - Nested object section titles
- `.error` - Unsupported type errors

### Array Editor (from array_editor.py)
- `.array-editor` - Array editor container
- `.array-title` - Array title label
- `.enum-array-select` - Enum array VerticalScroll container
- `.simple-array-table` - DataTable for simple arrays
- `.add-item-controls` - Container for add item controls
- `.object-array-table` - DataTable for object arrays
- `.add-object-button` - Add button for object arrays

### Widget Type Styles (still active)
- `Input` - Input field styling
- `SelectCurrent` - Select dropdown display
- `Select:focus > SelectCurrent` - Focused select
- `Select > SelectOverlay` - Dropdown overlay
- `Checkbox .toggle--button` - Checkbox button styling
- `Checkbox.unchecked .toggle--button` - Unchecked checkbox

## UNUSED CSS Classes (can be removed)

### Completely Unused
1. **`.field-help`** (lines 141-146)
   - Was for help text, never referenced in code
   
2. **`.terminal-warning`** (lines 161-170)
   - Not used anywhere in the modal
   
3. **`.inline-checkbox`** (lines 172-184)
   - Not used, regular Checkbox styling is used instead

4. **`.nested-object-container`** (lines 232-242)
   - Removed when we eliminated Container wrapping for nested objects
   
5. **`.nested-field-label`** (lines 244-249)
   - Replaced by regular `.field-label` for all fields

6. **`.multi-select-field`** (lines 252-259)
   - MultiSelectField widget is imported but never used
   
7. **`.multi-select-option`** (lines 261-273)
   - Part of unused MultiSelectField
   
8. **`.multi-select-field Checkbox` styles** (lines 276-287)
   - Part of unused MultiSelectField
   
9. **`.no-options`** (lines 289-293)
   - Not used anywhere

## Unused Imports
- `from gatekit.tui.widgets.multi_select_field import MultiSelectField` (line 20)
  - Widget is imported but never instantiated

## Recommendations

### Immediate Cleanup
1. Remove all 9 unused CSS class definitions (lines 141-146, 161-184, 232-249, 252-293)
2. Remove unused MultiSelectField import
3. Total lines to remove: ~100 lines of CSS

### Keep for Now
- All Input, Select, Checkbox base widget styles - actively used
- All `.field-*`, `.array-*`, `.section-*` classes - generated by adapters
- Modal structure classes (`.dialog`, `.title`, `.form-content`, `.button-row`)

### Consider Consolidating
- Some Checkbox styling is duplicated (general and multi-select context)
- After removing multi-select, only need one set of Checkbox styles

## Impact Assessment
- **Risk**: Low - removing only unused classes
- **Testing**: Run TUI after cleanup to verify no visual regressions
- **Benefits**: 
  - Cleaner, more maintainable CSS
  - ~100 fewer lines of code
  - No confusion about which styles are active
